title: Alimentary tract
creator_credit: Encyclopaedia Britannica Films and ERPI Classroom Films
brief_description: Intended as a supplement to Digestion of foods, this film treats in detail, motility phenomena of the gastro-intestinal tract. Actual photography reveals different types of movements in the stomach, such as hypermotility, inhibition, antiperistalsis, hunger contractions and normal movements.
